long_description: Stop the chill, the women's Marmot Sunset 20 synthetic-fill sleeping bag offers innovative construction to keep you warm from top to bottom, with nearly the same weight and packability as a down bag! Designed to fit a woman's body, bag offers increased room at hips, decreased room at shoulders and extra insulation in critical heat-loss areas. Thermal R synthetic insulation's excellent loft keeps you warm with minimal weight; innovative wave construction, with overlapping shingles of insulation, prevents cold spots. Non-bulky Thermal R insulation maximizes warmth while reducing the adverse effects of perspiration, condensation and humidity inside the sleeping bag. Body-mapping of insulation directs warmth to key areas and maximizes thermal efficiency. With a European Norm (EN) comfort rating of 23degF, the Sunset 20 is a versatile bag for 3-season adventures. Anatomic 3D hood envelops your head in warmth; Face Muff allows hood to be cinched snug without digging into face. Trapezoidal footbox allows insulation to loft fully around your feet for optimum warmth and comfort. Full-length zipper with a snagless draft tube prevents fabric from snagging in the zipper coils. No more midnight drawcord fumbling-smooth, flat upper cord and hard, round lower cord make hood and collar adjustments easy. Marmot Sunset 20 comes with a lightweight stuff sack. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
